Agitation.Name: Agitation
Agitation.Description:
You get excited in anticipation of hooking your prey. Increases your movement speed while transporting bodies by {0}%. While transporting a body, your Terror Radius is increased by {1} meters.
"At some point, the excitement of hooking one of us becomes more important than the desire to kill us."

Brutal_Strength.Name: Brutal Strength
Brutal_Strength.Description:
Your great strength allows you to shred through your prey's defenses. Destroy dropped pallets, breakable walls, and generators {0}% faster.
"It's more than muscles. A dark power motivates the beast."

Unnerving_Presence.Name: Unnerving Presence
Unnerving_Presence.Description:
Your presence alone instills great fear. Survivors within your Terror Radius have a {0}% greater chance of triggering Skill Checks when repairing or healing. Triggered Skill Checks' success zones are reduced by {1}%.
"Its presence befalls us."

Predator.Name: Predator
Predator.Description:
Your acute tracking ability allows you to hone in on disturbances left by running Survivors.
Scratch marks left by Survivors will spawn considerably closer together.
"Never stop moving and hope you're always two steps ahead of the beast." -Notebook

Shadowborn.Name: Shadowborn
Shadowborn.Description:
You have a keen vision in the darkness of the night. Your field of view is {0} degrees wider than normal.
Does not stack with other FOV increases.
"Shining in the darkest dark, his eyes pierce the night and sting your soul."

Bloodhound.Name: Bloodhound
Bloodhound.Description:
Like a hunting scent hound, you smell traces of blood at a great distance. Fresh blood marks are considerably more discernible than normal and can be tracked for {0} seconds longer than normal.
"Pebbles shimmering in the moonlight; my life drips down in a trail so easy to follow."

Lightborn.Name: Lightborn
Lightborn.Description:
Unlike other beasts of The Fog, you have adapted to light. You are immune to Blindness caused by Flashlights, firecrackers, flashbangs, and blast mines. Survivors that attempt blinding you have their aura revealed for {0} seconds.
"These monsters… they adapt! They emerge with strange new abilities." -Vigo's Journal

Enduring.Name: Enduring
Enduring.Description:
You are resilient to pain. You reduce the duration of pallet stuns by {0}%.
"He stops at nothing."

Tinkerer.Name: Tinkerer
Tinkerer.Description:
When a generator is repaired to {0}% repair progress, it triggers a loud noise notification and you are granted the Undetectable status effect for {2} seconds.
"The Hillbilly makes impressive tools out of scraps. Tools aimed at maiming us in creative ways..." -Notebook

Distressing.Name: Distressing
Distressing.Description:
Your horrifying emanation strikes at a supernaturally long distance. Your Terror Radius is increased by {0}%. Gain {1}% more Bloodpoints for actions in the Deviousness category.
"Bask in their fear."

Monstrous_Shrine.Name: Monstrous Shrine
Monstrous_Shrine.Description:
Your fervent care of the hooks found in the basement have aroused The Entity's interest. The basement hooks grant the following bonuses:
  • {0}% faster Entity progress.
  • {1}% increased difficulty on escape attempts.
  • {2}% increased penalty on escape fails.

    • "Then you will know that there is no escape. When hanging in the depths, you face the dark one."

Unrelenting.Name: Unrelenting
Unrelenting.Description: You recuperate faster from missed attacks made with your main weapon. The cooldown after missed basic attacks is reduced by {0}%.

Sloppy_Butcher.Name: Sloppy Butcher
Sloppy_Butcher.Description:
You know where to hit to make them bleed. Wounds inflicted by successful basic attacks cause the Mangled and Hemorrhage status effects. Hemorrhage considerably increases the Survivor's bleeding frequency.
The Hemorrhage effect caused by Sloppy Butcher is removed once the Survivor is fully healed.
"It's in its sadistic nature. There is no swift kill as it delights in the obscene spectacle of our agonizing suffering."

Iron_Grasp.Name: Iron Grasp
Iron_Grasp.Description: Your powerful hold on the Survivors causes escapes to be nearly impossible. Effects of Survivor struggling are reduced by {0}%. Time to struggle out of your grasp is increased by {1}%.

Spies_From_The_Shadows.Name: Spies from the Shadows
Spies_From_The_Shadows.Description:
The crows found in the world can communicate with you directly. {0}% of the time, cawing crows give you a visual cue when you are within a {1} meter range.
Spies From The Shadows has a cooldown of {2} seconds.
"In the shadows they torment, scarring our minds with each scream."

Bitter_Murmur.Name: Bitter Murmur
Bitter_Murmur.Description:
Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability. Each time a generator is fully repaired, Survivors within {0} meters of the completed generator will be revealed for {1} seconds.
When the last generator is fully repaired, all the Survivors' auras are revealed for {2} seconds.

Deerstalker.Name: Deerstalker
Deerstalker.Description: Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability. Reveals dying Survivors' auras when standing within a {0} meter range.

Insidious.Name: Insidious
Insidious.Description:
Unlocks the stealth ability.

Standing still for {0} seconds grants you the Undetectable status effect until you move or act again.

No_One_Escapes_Death.Name: Hex: No One Escapes Death
No_One_Escapes_Death.Description:
A Hex rooting its power on hope. You are animated by the power of your Hex Totem when the Survivors are on the verge of escaping.
Once the exit gates are powered, if there is a Dull Totem remaining on the map, this Hex is applied to it.

While this Hex is active,
  • Survivors suffer from the Exposed status effect.
  • Your movement speed is increased by {0}%

    • The Hex effects persist as long as the related Hex Totem is standing.

    "And the beast became faster and more powerful as if The Entity's shadowy whips were lashing at its back."

Whispers.Name: Whispers
Whispers.Description:
You have a rudimentary understanding of The Entity's voice. Sporadically hear The Entity's whisper when standing within a {0} meter range of a Survivor.
"It's unclear as to the motivations of The Fog, but it is undeniable that it often takes the beast's side." -Notebook

Bond.Name: Bond
Bond.Description:
Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability. Allies' auras are revealed to you when they are within a {0} meter range.
"We have to work as a team, I need you to survive so that I can survive!" -Dwight

Prove_Thyself.Name: Prove Thyself
Prove_Thyself.Description:
For every other Survivor working on a generator within a {1} meter range, gain {0}% repair speed bonus. This same bonus is also applied to all other Survivors within range.
Gain {2}% more Bloodpoints for coop actions.
Survivors can only be affected by one Prove Thyself effect at a time.
"Show me what you can do!" -Dwight

Leader.Name: Leader
Leader.Description:
You're able to organize a team to cooperate more efficiently. Increases other Survivors' healing, sabotage, unhooking, cleansing, opening exit gates, and chest unlocking speeds by {0}% when they are within a {1} meter range from you.
Survivors can only be affected by one Leader effect at a time.
This effect persists on other Survivors for {2} seconds after leaving the Leader's effective perk range.

Saboteur.Name: Saboteur
Saboteur.Description:
Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability.
  • See hook auras in a 56 meter radius from the pickup spot if a Survivor is being carried.

    • Unlocks the ability to sabotage hooks without a Toolbox.
  • Sabotaging a hook without a Toolbox takes 2.5 seconds.
  • The sabotage action has a {0} second cooldown.

Calm_Spirit.Name: Calm Spirit
Calm_Spirit.Description:
Animals seem to trust you as they often stay calm in your presence. Reduces chances of alerting woodland creatures by {0}%.
Calm Spirit allows you to overcome the urge to scream.

Iron_Will.Name: Iron Will
Iron_Will.Description: You're able to concentrate and enter a meditative-like state to numb some pain. Grunts of pain caused by injuries are reduced by {0}%.

Adrenaline.Name: Adrenaline
Adrenaline.Description:
You are fuelled by unexpected energy when on the verge of escape. Instantly heal one health state and sprint at {0}% of your normal running speed for {1} seconds when the exit gates are powered. Adrenaline is on hold if you are disabled at the moment it should take effect and will activate when freed.
Adrenaline will wake you up if you are asleep when it triggers.
Adrenaline ignores the Exhausted status effect.
Causes the Exhausted status effect for {2} seconds.
You do not recover from the Exhausted status effect when running.

Sprint_Burst.Name: Sprint Burst
Sprint_Burst.Description:
When starting to run, break into a sprint at {0}% of your normal running speed for a maximum of {1} seconds.
Causes the Exhausted status effect for {2} seconds.
Sprint Burst cannot be used while Exhausted.
You do not recover from the Exhausted status effect while running.

QuickQuiet.Name: Quick & Quiet
QuickQuiet.Description:
You do not make as much noise as others when quickly vaulting over obstacles or hiding in lockers.

The vault and hide actions' noise detection and audio range is reduced by {0}%.

This effect can only trigger once every {1} seconds.

Botany_Knowledge.Name: Botany Knowledge
Botany_Knowledge.Description:
You transform plants found around the campfire into tinctures that slow down bleeding. Healing speed and healing item efficiency are increased by {0}%.

"Basic botany knowledge could save your life someday."

Empathy.Name: Empathy
Empathy.Description: Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability. Dying or injured allies' auras are revealed to you when within a {0} meter range. Empathy does not reveal auras of allies when they are in direct contact with the Killer.

Self_Care.Name: Self-Care
Self_Care.Description: Unlocks the ability to heal yourself without a healing item at {0}% the normal healing speed. Increases the efficiency of healing item self-heal by {1}%.

No_One_Left_Behind.Name: No One Left Behind
No_One_Left_Behind.Description:
It is inconceivable to leave someone behind. Once at least one exit gate is opened, you gain the following effects:
  • {0}% additional Bloodpoints for healing and unhooking other Survivors.
  • {1}% bonus action speed when healing and unhooking other Survivors.
  • The auras of all other Survivors are revealed to you.

    • "...yeah, no shit. But I believe we can outsmart and overthrow him if we work together. Don't be predictable and selfish!" -Lost Tapes: Clyde

WellMakeIt.Name: We'll make it
WellMakeIt.Description:
Helping others heightens your morale.

When you rescue a Survivor from a hook, gain a {0}% speed increase while healing others for {1} seconds.
"I'm confident we can all escape in one piece if we help each other."

Slippery_Meat.Name: Slippery Meat
Slippery_Meat.Description:
You have developed an efficient way to get off hooks.
  • Grants up to {0} extra escape attempts on the hook.
  • Hook escape attempts have a {1}% increased chance to succeed.

Small_Game.Name: Small Game
Small_Game.Description:
You have the undeniable capability to sense danger. Get an auditory warning when looking in the direction of Totems in a 45-degree cone within a range of {0} meters. Small Game has a cooldown of {1} seconds each time it activates. For each Dull Totem and Hex Totem cleansed by any player, gain a Token. Small Game's detection cone is reduced by 5 degrees per token.
"Nope." -Lost Tapes: Andy

Resilience.Name: Resilience
Resilience.Description:
You are motivated in dire situations. Grants {0}% additional speed when repairing, sabotaging, healing, unhooking, vaulting, cleansing, opening exit gates, and unlocking while injured.
"Focus, even in these desperate times."

This_Is_Not_Happening.Name: This Is Not Happening
This_Is_Not_Happening.Description: You perform at your best when you are under extreme stress. Great Skill Check success zones when repairing and healing get {0}% bigger when you are injured.

Hope.Name: Hope
Hope.Description:
The growing odds of a successful escape fill you with hope and give you wings. As soon as the exit gates are powered you gain a {0}% Haste status effect for {1} seconds.

"Buckle up, fuckos! Let's roll!" -Lost Tapes: Nikki

Lightweight.Name: Lightweight
Lightweight.Description:
Your running is light and soft, making your tracks harder to follow. Scratch marks stay visible {0} seconds less than normal.
"Take it slow, he knows where you've been… just like I`ve always said: live slow and die old." -Lost Tapes: Dylan

Dark_Sense.Name: Dark Sense
Dark_Sense.Description:
Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability. Each time a generator is completed, The Killer's aura is revealed to you for {0} seconds.
When the last generator is powered the Killer's aura is revealed to you for {1} seconds.
"Take it from an old-timer: Slow down, don't rush and try not to worry so much! The best way to beat him is to know how he thinks." -Lost Tapes: Murf

Deja_Vu.Name: Deja Vu
Deja_Vu.Description:
Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability. Paranoia paired with the horror of failure drives you to avoid repeating the same mistakes.
The auras of {0} generators which are in close proximity to one another are revealed to you for {1} seconds, at the start of the match and each time a generator is completed.
If you are holding a map that can track generators, generators revealed by Deja Vu are added to the map.

Plunderers_Instinct.Name: Plunderer's Instinct
Plunderers_Instinct.Description:
Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability. The auras of unopened chests and items in the environment are revealed to you when standing within a {0} meter range. Grants a considerably better chance at finding an item of higher rarity from chests.
"The pioneers used to loot these babies for hours." -Lost Tapes: Aizeyu

Premonition.Name: Premonition
Premonition.Description:
You have the undeniable capability to sense danger. Get an auditory warning when looking in the direction of the Killer in a 45 degree cone within a range of {0} meters. Premonition has a cooldown of {1} seconds each time it activates.
"I have a bad feeling about this!"

Spine_Chill.Name: Spine Chill
Spine_Chill.Description:
An unnatural tingle warns you of impending doom. Get notified when the Killer is looking directly in your direction and standing within a {0} meter range. While Spine Chill is active, Skill Check trigger odds are increased by {1}% with success zones reduced by {2}%. While Spine Chill is active your speed while repairing, sabotaging, healing, unhooking, vaulting, cleansing, opening exit gates, and unlocking is increased by {3}%.
"There is a voice that doesn't use words. Listen." -Lost Tapes: Sassy

Kindred.Name: Kindred
Kindred.Description:
Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability. While you are on the hook, all Survivor's auras are revealed to all other Survivors. If The Killer is within a {0} meter range, The Killer's aura is revealed to all other Survivors.

While a Survivor other than you is on the hook, all other Survivors’ auras are revealed to you. If The Killer is within a {0} meter range of the hooked Survivor, The Killer's aura is revealed to you.
“Be kind to one another. We’re all in this together.” -Lost Tapes: Sujan

Open_Handed.Name: Open-Handed
Open_Handed.Description:
Strengthens the potential of you and your team's aura reading abilities.
  • Increases aura reading ranges by {0} meters.
  • Survivors may only be affected by one Open-Handed effect at a time.

    • “Paying attention is what kept me alive through the years. That, and my good looks of course.” -Ace

Up_The_Ante.Name: Up the Ante
Up_The_Ante.Description:
All will be well in the end; you just know it. Your confidence strengthens the feeling of hope for those around you. For each other Survivor still alive, grant a {0}% bonus of luck to all remaining Survivors.
“What can I say? I’m just a very lucky guy… I’m sure some of it will rub off on you.” -Ace

Ace_In_The_Hole.Name: Ace in the Hole
Ace_In_The_Hole.Description:
Lady Luck always seems to be throwing something good your way.
When retrieving an item from a chest, there is a {0}% chance that a Very Rare (or lower) add-on will be attached to it.
{1}% chance of finding an add-on of Uncommon rarity (or lower).
When escaping, keep any add-ons your item has.
“Everything that glitters isn’t gold. But gold isn't worth a damn in this place, so this should come in handy.” -Ace

Hex_The_Third_Seal.Name: Hex: The Third Seal
Hex_The_Third_Seal.Description:
A Hex that hinders one's aura reading ability. Hitting a Survivor with a basic attack or a special attack while the Hex Totem is active applies the Blindness status effect. This effect applies to the last {0} Survivors hit.
The Hex effects persist as long as the related Hex Totem is standing.
“She touched your skin, you bear the witch's mark!”

Hex_Ruin.Name: Hex: Ruin
Hex_Ruin.Description:
A Hex that affects all Survivors' generator repairs progress. All generators are affected by Hex: Ruin. While a generator is not being repaired by a Survivor, it will immediately and automatically regress repair progress at {0}% of the normal regression speed.

The Hex effects persist as long as the related Hex Totem is standing.

“A curse is upon you. It will be your ruin.”

Hex_Devour_Hope.Name: Hex: Devour Hope
Hex_Devour_Hope.Description:
A Hex rooting its power on hope. The false hope of Survivors ignites your hunger. When a Survivor is rescued from a hook at least 24 meters away, Devour Hope receives a token.
  • 2 Tokens: Gain a {0}% Haste status effect,10 seconds after hooking a Survivor, for a duration of 10 seconds.
  • 3 Tokens: Survivors suffer from the Exposed status effect.
  • 5 Tokens: Grants the ability to kill Survivors by your own hand.

    • The Hex effects persist as long as the related Hex Totem is standing.

    “If you do nothing, you have their blood on your hands. If you save them, her hunger grows.“

Hex_Thrill_Of_The_Hunt.Name: Hex: Thrill of the Hunt
Hex_Thrill_Of_The_Hunt.Description:
A Hex rooting its power on hope. The false hope of Survivors fills you with excitement and strengthen your Totems. For each Dull and Hex Totem remaining on the map gain a token.
  • Gain {0}% more Bloodpoints for actions in the Hunter category for each token.
  • Survivors' cleansing and blessing speed is reduced by {1}% for each token.

    • The Hex effects persist as long as the related Hex Totem is standing.

FlipFlop.Name: Flip-Flop
FlipFlop.Description:
You have an uncanny ability to escape the inevitable.

While in dying state, {0}% of your recovery progression is converted into wiggle progression when you are picked up by The Killer, up to a maximum of {1}% total wiggle progression.

"Catch ya on the flip-flop." -Ash Williams

BuckleUp.Name: Buckle Up
BuckleUp.Description:
Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability. The recovery progress of dying Survivors can be determined by the intensity of their auras at a distance of up to {0} meters.

When you heal a Survivor from the dying state to injured, both the healed Survivor and yourself see The Killer's aura for a duration of {1} seconds.

“Ghost beaters never leave a man behind." -Ash Williams

TheMettleOfMan.Name: Mettle of Man
TheMettleOfMan.Description:
Evil has a way of always finding you.

After you earn {0} Protection Hit scoring events, Mettle of Man activates.

Once activated, the next occasion that would put you into the dying state from the injured state is ignored.

The next time you heal back to full health, your aura will be revealed to the Killer when you are further than {1} meters from the Killer.

Mettle of Man will deactivate the next time you are put into the dying state.
  • Increases your chances to be the Killer’s Obsession.
  • The Killer can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.


    • "Evil has a bullseye on my back the size of Tiger Stadium." -Ash Williams

K22P01.Name: Hoarder
K22P01.Description:
You protect what little you have and are attentive to any disturbance of your stockpiles.

Survivors reveal their location when they interact with a chest or when they pick up an item within {0} meters of your location.

The trial begins with up to {1} additional chests in the environment.

K22P02.Name: Oppression
K22P02.Description:
Life has been difficult for you, so you’ll make it difficult for others.

When you damage a generator, up to {0} other random generators also begin regressing.

If the affected generators are being repaired, any Survivors repairing them receive a difficult Skill Check.

Oppression has a cooldown of {1} seconds.

"Damn them as they would damn us." —Charlotte Deshayes

K22P03.Name: Coup de Grâce
K22P03.Description:
As the end nears, you go in for the kill.

Each time a generator is completed, Coup de Grâce grows in power. Gain a token.

Consume one token to increase the distance of your next lunge attack by {0}%.

S24P01.Name: Appraisal
S24P01.Description:
You have a careful eye that notices what many overlook.

Start the trial with {0} tokens. When a chest has already been opened, consume a token to rummage through it for an item. Rummaging can only be performed once per chest.

You rummage through chests {1}% faster.

S24P02.Name: Deception
S24P02.Description:
Your adventurous lifestyle requires moments of crafty misdirection.

Interacting with a locker while sprinting will trigger a loud noise notification at your location and cause you to leave no scratch marks for {0} seconds.

You no longer enter lockers while sprinting and while this perk is active.

Deception can only be triggered once every {1} seconds.

S24P03.Name: Power Struggle
S24P03.Description:
You’ve never given up and you’re not about to start now.

Whenever you are in the dying state, you see the auras of available Pallets.
While being carried by The Killer, reaching {0}% wiggle progress activates Power Struggle. While Power Struggle is active, you can drop a nearby, standing pallet to stun The Killer.

“I relied on others to protect me once and I lost everything. Never again.” —Élodie Rakoto

BBQAndChilli.Name: Barbecue & Chili
BBQAndChilli.Description:
A deep bond with The Entity unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability. After hooking a Survivor, all other Survivors' auras are revealed to you for {0} seconds when they are further than {1} meters from the hook.
  • Each time that a Survivor is hooked for the first time, gain a {2}% stackable bonus to all Bloodpoint gains up to a maximum of {3}%.
    The bonus Bloodpoints are only awarded post-trial.

    • "I just can't take no pleasure in killing. There's just some things you gotta do. Don't mean you have to like it." -Drayton Sawyer

InTheDark.Name: Knock Out
InTheDark.Description:
The trauma caused by your brutal attacks makes crying for help painfully difficult.
Survivors put into the dying state by your basic attacks are not revealed to other Survivors when they are standing outside of a {2}-meter range.
Survivors put into the dying state by your basic attacks crawl {1}% slower for {0} seconds.
During this time, Survivors are affected by the Blindness status effect.
"Oh, that gun's no good. The old way… with a sledge! You see, that way's better. They die better that way." -Nubbins Sawyer

FranklinsLoss.Name: Franklin's Demise
FranklinsLoss.Description:
Your basic attacks make Survivors drop their item on impact. While on the ground, it takes up to {0} seconds for the item to lose all of its charges if it is not picked up.
Reveal items on the ground within {1} meters with a white aura. The Aura will slowly fade to red until the Item is empty of charges.
"Sally, I hear something. Stop! Stop!" -Franklin

K23P01.Name: Starstruck
K23P01.Description:
Your unmatched showmanship dazzles all.

While carrying a Survivor, any other Survivors within your Terror Radius suffer from the Exposed status effect.
The effect persists for {0} seconds on Survivors who leave your Terror Radius, as well as those within the radius when you hook or release the carried Survivor.
Starstruck has a cooldown of {1} seconds once a Survivor is no longer carried.

"Enjoy this moment, few get so close." — Ji-Woon Hak

K23P02.Name: Hex: Crowd Control
K23P02.Description:
A Hex that ensures those lesser than you are properly herded.

The Entity blocks a window for {0} seconds after a Survivor performs a rushed vault through it.

The Hex effects persist as long as the related Hex Totem is standing.

"You have no control. People like you never did." — Ji-Woon Hak

K23P03.Name: No Way Out
K23P03.Description:
You're not going to let just anyone into the VIP room.

After hooking a Survivor for the first time, No Way Out gains a token. Once the exit gates have been powered, No Way Out activates.
  • When a Survivor interacts with an exit gate switch, you receive a loud noise notification. The Entity then blocks both exit gate switches for {0} seconds, plus an additional {1} seconds for each token in your possession.


    • "That sound when you bleed...let me hear it again." — Ji-Woon Hak

S25P01.Name: Fast Track
S25P01.Description:
Sometimes the sacrifice of others is necessary to get ahead.

Whenever another Survivor is hooked, you gain {0} tokens.You consume all tokens after a great Skill Check on a generator. Each token consumed grants a {1}% bonus progression for great Skill Checks when repairing generators.

"The weak are sacrificed first. It's nature, it's business... it's the truth most refuse to face." — Yun-Jin

S25P02.Name: Smash Hit
S25P02.Description:
When your rival makes a mistake, you seize the opportunity.

After stunning the Killer with a pallet, break into a sprint at {0}% your normal running speed for {1} seconds.
Causes the Exhausted status effect for {2} seconds.
This perk cannot be used while Exhausted.

"I've dealt with psychopaths in suits. You're just uglier and worse dressed." —Yun-Jin

S25P03.Name: Self-Preservation
S25P03.Description:
Life's unforgiving. Sometimes it's best to look out for yourself.

Whenever another Survivor within {0} meters of you gets hit by a basic attack or a special attack, Self-Preservation activates.
Your scratch marks, pools of blood and grunts of pain are hidden for {1} seconds.

"Something I learned in the industry: when the axe is swinging, keep your head down." — Yun-Jin

SoleSurvivor.Name: Sole Survivor
SoleSurvivor.Description:
As more of your friends fall to the Killer, you become shrouded in isolation and the Killer's aura reading abilities towards you are disrupted.
Every time a fellow Survivor is killed or sacrificed, gain a token. For each token, your aura cannot be read by The Killer within a max range of {0} meters for each killed or sacrificed Survivor.
  • Increases your chances of being The Killer's Obsession.
  • The Killer can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.

    • “It was the boogeyman.” -Laurie Strode

DecisiveStrike.Name: Decisive Strike
DecisiveStrike.Description:
Stab at your aggressor in an attempt to escape.
After being unhooked or unhooking yourself, Decisive Strike activates for {0} seconds.
While active, complete a Skill Check when grabbed by the Killer to escape, stunning them for 5 seconds.
  • Succeeding or failing the Skill Check disables Decisive Strike.
  • You become the Obsession after stunning the Killer.

    • While active, the following interactions deactivate Decisive Strike:
  • Repairing a generator
  • Healing yourself or others
  • Cleansing or Blessing a Totem
  • Sabotaging a hook
  • Unhooking others

  • Increases your chance to be the Obsession.
  • The Killer can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.

ObjectOfObsession.Name: Object of Obsession
ObjectOfObsession.Description:
A supernatural bond links you to the Killer.

Whenever your aura is revealed to the Killer, the Killer's aura becomes visible to you and you gain a {0}% bonus to healing, repairing and cleansing speed.
If you are the Obsession, your aura is revealed to the Killer for 3 seconds once every 30 seconds.
Increases your chances of being the Obsession.

“He was watching me!” -Laurie Strode

Save_The_Best_For_Last.Name: Save the best for last
Save_The_Best_For_Last.Description:
You become obsessed with one Survivor.
Earn a token for each successful basic attack that is not dealt to the Obsession.
Each token grants a stackable {0}% decreased successful basic attack cooldown, you can earn up to {1} tokens.
Hitting your Obsession with a basic attack will cause you to lose {2} tokens.
You can no longer gain tokens if your Obsession is sacrificed or killed.
  • The Killer can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.

    • "Death has come to your little town, sheriff." -Dr. Sam Loomis

Dying_Light.Name: Dying Light
Dying_Light.Description:
You become obsessed with one Survivor.
Your Obsession gains a {0}% action speed bonus to unhooking and healing other Survivors.
Each time you hook a Survivor other than the Obsession, if the Obsession is alive, gain a token.
If the Obsession is alive, all Survivors who are not the Obsession get {1}% penalty to repair, healing and sabotage speeds for each token.
  • The Killer can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.

    • "This isn't a man..." -Dr.Sam Loomis

Play_With_Your_Food.Name: Play with your food
Play_With_Your_Food.Description:
You become obsessed with one Survivor.
Every time you chase your Obsession and let them escape, you receive a token up to a maximum of {0} tokens.
Each token increases your movement speed by {1}%.
Performing a basic attack or Special Attack spends one token.
  • The Killer can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.

    • “You've fooled them, haven't you Michael? But not me.” -Dr. Sam Loomis

Technician.Name: Technician
Technician.Description:
You are apt at handling machinery with the greatest care and precision.
The noises caused by your repairs and their hearing distance are reduced by {0} meters.
On a failed repair Skill Check, the following effects happen:
  • The generator explosion will be prevented.
  • The generator loses progress as usual.
  • An additional {1}% progress is lost.

    • “I’m gonna stealth this one.” -Feng Min

Lithe.Name: Lithe
Lithe.Description:
After performing a rushed vault, break into a sprint at {0}% of your normal running speed for a maximum of {1} seconds.
Causes the Exhausted status effect for {2} seconds.
Lithe cannot be used while Exhausted.
You do not recover from the Exhausted status effect while running.
“U mad?” -Feng Min

Alert.Name: Alert
Alert.Description:
Your acute senses are on high alert.
When the Killer performs a break action, the Killer is revealed to you for {0} seconds.
“I have true sight.” -Feng Min

OverwhelmingPresence.Name: Overwhelming Presence
OverwhelmingPresence.Description:
Your presence alone instills great fear. Survivors within your Terror Radius suffer from inefficiency.
Affected Survivors' item consumption rates are increased by {0}%.
"Shit!! I dropped the gauze!"

MonitorAndAbuse.Name: Monitor & Abuse
MonitorAndAbuse.Description:
Meticulous in your approach, terrifying in your application.
While in a chase, your Terror Radius is increased by {0} meters. Otherwise, your Terror Radius is decreased by {0} meters and your field of view is increased by {1} degrees.
Field of view gains do not stack.
"It's time for your treatment!" -The Doctor

GeneratorOvercharge.Name: Overcharge
GeneratorOvercharge.Description:
You are fuelled by your hate for progress.
Overcharge a generator by performing the Damage Generator action. The next Survivor interacting with that generator is faced with a tremendously difficult Skill Check. Failing the Skill Check results in an additional {0}% loss of progress.
Succeeding the Skill Check grants no progress but prevents the generator explosion.
"It is a trap. But a trap one must step in…" -The Doctor

BeastOfPrey.Name: Beast of Prey
BeastOfPrey.Description:
Your lust for a kill is so intense that your connection with The Entity is momentarily lost, making you totally unpredictable.

Grants the Undetectable status effect after gaining Bloodlust Tier I. The status effect is removed once you lose Bloodlust.

  • Gain {0}% more Bloodpoints for actions in the Hunter Category.

    • "Where did she go?"

DeadHard.Name: Dead Hard
DeadHard.Description:
Activatable perk.
You can take a beating. When injured, tap into your adrenaline bank and dash forward quickly to avoid damage.
  • Press the Active Ability button while running to dash forward.
  • During the dash, you avoid damage.
  • Causes the Exhausted status effect for {0} seconds.
    You do not recover from the Exhausted status effect while running.

    • “We were walkin’ through t’ginnel one night when a beer bottle flew past me, then another, and another. I thought to myself, “Gonna ’ave some fun ‘ere lads, let’s get stuck in!” It were a right dust up, I swear down!” -David King

Hex_HuntressLullaby.Name: Hex: Huntress Lullaby
Hex_HuntressLullaby.Description:
A Hex rooting its power in despair. Your hunt is an irresistible song of dread which muddles your prey's attention. Survivors receive a {0}% regression penalty when missing a Skill Check while healing or repairing.
Each time a Survivor is hooked, Huntress Lullaby grows in power. It affects healing and repairing Skill Check warnings:
  • 1 to 4 Tokens: Time between the Skill Check warning sound and the Skill Check becomes shorter.
  • 5 Tokens: No Skill Check warning.

    • The Hex effects persist as long as the related Hex Totem is standing.

NoMither.Name: No Mither
NoMither.Description:
You are affected by the Broken status effect for the duration of the trial.
Your thick blood coagulates practically instantly.
  • You don't leave pools of blood.
  • Grunts of pain caused by injuries are reduced by {0}% at any time.
  • Your recovery speed is increased by {1}% and you can completely recover from the dying state.

    • “I lost it. Just lamped him one. They went and banned me didn’t they. Went t’pub afterwards, had a few pints and moved on to the next chapter. I couldn’t be mithered with it all anyway, you know what I mean? Can’t be arsed.” -David King

TerritorialImperative.Name: Territorial Imperative
TerritorialImperative.Description:
Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability. Survivors' auras are revealed to you for {0} seconds when they enter the basement and you are more than {1} meters away from the basement entrance.
Territorial Imperative can only be triggered once every {2} seconds.

WereGonnaLiveForever.Name: We're Gonna Live Forever
WereGonnaLiveForever.Description:
Your few friends deserve the best protection.
When healing another Survivor in the dying state, your healing speed is increased by 100%.
Gain a token for performing any of the following actions:
  • Perform a Safe Hook Rescue
  • Take a hit to protect a Survivor
  • Rescue a Survivor by stunning the Killer with a pallet
  • Rescue a Survivor by blinding the Killer with a Flashlight
    • Gain a 25% stackable bonus per token to all Bloodpoint gains up to a maximum of {1}%. The bonus Bloodpoints are only awarded post-trial.
    “Come on then, let’s ‘ave it! I don’t give a shit pal.” -David King

K24P01.Name: Lethal Pursuer
K24P01.Description:
You've been designed to track down and eliminate targets.

At the start of the trial, the auras of all Survivors are revealed to you for {0} seconds.

"...it knows what it wants and won't stop till it gets it." —Carlos Oliveira<\span>

K24P02.Name: Hysteria
K24P02.Description:
You know how to brutalize one member of a team to cause a panic.

Whenever a healthy Survivor becomes injured by any means, all injured Survivors suffer from the Oblivious status effect for {0} seconds
Hysteria can only trigger once every {1} seconds.

"Sorry I got a little jumpy there. Didn't know quite what to expect." —Robert Kendo

K24P03.Name: Eruption
K24P03.Description:
The NE-α parasite provides you with the intelligence and awareness needed to set a trap.

After kicking a generator, its aura is highlighted in yellow.
  • Whenever a Survivor enters the dying state, every affected generator explodes, losing {0}% worth of progress and continuing to regress.
  • Any Survivor repairing a generator when it explodes will scream and suffer from the Incapacitated status effect for {1} seconds.

    • Eruption has a cooldown of {2} seconds.

    "It can use weapons?" —Jill Valentine

S26P01.Name: Counterforce
S26P01.Description:
You know how to withstand an enemy stronger than you, and it starts with hunting down and knocking out their support.

You cleanse Totems 20% faster. After cleansing a Totem, you see the aura of the furthest Totem from you for {0} seconds and you gain an additional {1}% stackable speed bonus to cleansing Totems for the remainder of the trial.

"I don't mind a little detective work." —Jill Valentine

S26P02.Name: Resurgence
S26P02.Description:
You've come back from near impossible odds... and you'll do it again.

Gain {0}% healing progress instantly after being unhooked or unhooking yourself.

"It's my turn, bitch." —Jill Valentine

S26P03.Name: Blast Mine
S26P03.Description:
When direct combat isn't an option, you still find ways to strike back.

Blast Mine activates after completing a total of {0}% worth of repair progress on generators.
After repairing a generator for at least {1} seconds, press the Ability button to install a trap which stays active for {2} seconds. Affected generators will be revealed to all Survivors by a yellow aura. Only one trap can be active on a generator.
  • When the Killer damages a trapped generator, the trap explodes, stunning them and blinding anyone nearby. Blast Mine is then deactivated.


    • "You want S.T.A.R.S.? I'll give you S.T.A.R.S.! " —Jill Valentine

S27P01.Name: Bite the Bullet
S27P01.Description:
Pain hurts you as much as anyone, but you'd prefer others don't know that.

When healing, you and the Survivor you're healing make no noise, including grunts of pain. There is no noise notification on failed healing skill checks and healing regresses by only {0}%.

"I can do this." —Leon S. Kennedy

S27P02.Name: Flashbang
S27P02.Description:
You've adapted to a world in chaos and making what you can from the debris.

After completing {0}% progress on any generator, Flashbang activates.
Enter a locker while empty-handed and press the Ability button to craft a flash grenade.
  • 1 charge.
  • Detonates with a loud bang and flashing light.
  • Creates a noise notification.
  • Can be used to distract or blind.

    • You leave the flash grenade behind when escaping the trial.

    "Get outta my face!" —Leon S. Kennedy

S27P03.Name: Rookie Spirit
S27P03.Description:
You keep a careful eye on objectives when they're slipping away.

Complete {0} good or great Skill Checks while repairing generators to activate Rookie Spirit for the remainder of the trial.
Once active, you can see the aura of regressing generators.

"I'll stop this, lieutenant. I promise." —Leon S. Kennedy

BloodWarden.Name: Blood Warden
BloodWarden.Description:
As soon as an exit gate is opened, Blood Warden is activated. The auras of any Survivors located within Exit areas are revealed to you.
Once per match, hooking a Survivor while Blood Warden is active calls upon The Entity to block both Exits for all Survivors for {0} seconds.

FireUp.Name: Fire Up
FireUp.Description:
The increased pressure of losing your prey fills you with anger and gives you unsuspected motivation. Each time the Survivors complete repairs on a generator, Fire Up grows in power.
  • For each generator completed, gain a {0}% stackable buff that grants a speed bonus to picking up, dropping, vaulting, damaging generators, and breaking pallets for the remainder of the trial.

Pharmacy.Name: Pharmacy
Pharmacy.Description:
You have a knack for finding medicine. Unlocking chests is {0}% faster and the noises this causes, along with their hearing distances, are reduced by {1} meters.
Pharmacy guarantees an Emergency Med-kit on your first unlocked chest.

RememberMe.Name: Remember Me
RememberMe.Description:
You become obsessed with one Survivor. Each time your Obsession loses a health state, you increase the opening time of the exit gates by {0} seconds up to a maximum of {1} additional seconds.
The Obsession is not affected by Remember Me.
  • The Killer can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.

Vigil.Name: Vigil
Vigil.Description: You look over your friends even in dire situations. You and your allies within a {0} meter range recover from the Blindess, Broken, Exhaustion, Exposed, Hemorrhage, Hindered and Oblivious status effects {1}% faster. Once out of range, this effect persists for {2} seconds.

WakeUp.Name: Wake Up!
WakeUp.Description:
Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability. Once all generators are powered, exit gates are revealed to you within a {0} meter range. While opening the exit gates, reveal your aura to other Survivors up to {1} meters.
While Wake Up! is active, you open the exit gates {2}% faster.

HangmansTrick.Name: Hangman's Trick
HangmansTrick.Description:
Your ingenious modifications to hooks alert you of tampering.
  • Gain a notification when a Survivor begins sabotaging a hook.
  • While carrying a Survivor, see the aura of any Survivor within {0} meters of a hook.

    • "No excuses, no equivocations… No crying." -Amanda Young

Surveillance.Name: Surveillance
Surveillance.Description:
Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability. Any regressing generator will be highlighted by a white aura. If the regression is interrupted on a generator, it will be highlighted by a yellow aura for {0} seconds.
Noises created by generator repairs are audible at an additional {1} meters.
"Are you gonna behave?" -Amanda Young

MakeYourChoice.Name: Make your Choice
MakeYourChoice.Description:
When a Survivor rescues another from a hook at least {0} meters away from you, Make your Choice causes the Survivor to scream and applies the Exposed status effect to them for {1} seconds.
Make your Choice has a cooldown of {2} seconds.
"You'd be surprised what tools can save a life." -Amanda Young

Tenacity.Name: Tenacity
Tenacity.Description:
There is nothing stopping you. Your ferocious tenacity in dire situations allows you to crawl {0}% faster and recover at the same time.
"What the hell is this? I'm taking this bastard down!" -Detective David Tapp

DetectivesHunch.Name: Detective's Hunch
DetectivesHunch.Description:
Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability. When a generator is completed, the auras of generators, chests and Totems within {0} meters are revealed to you for {1} seconds.
If you are holding a Map that can track objectives, generators, chests and Totems revealed by Detective's Hunch are added to the Map.
"Are you able to tell us where you were last night?" -Detective David Tapp

StakeOut.Name: Stake Out
StakeOut.Description:
Getting close to the Killer fills you with determination. For each {0} seconds you are standing within the Killer Terror Radius and not in a chase, you gain a token up to a maximum of {1} tokens.
When Stake Out has at least 1 token, Good Skill Checks are considered Great Skill Checks, consume 1 token, and grant an additional 1% bonus to generator repair progress.
"I had you, I had you on your knees. You're runnin' scared because we had you. We're gonna close this case!" -Detective David Tapp

K25P01.Name: Deadlock
K25P01.Description:
You induce mental suffering by crushing any hope of escape.

After a generator is repaired, The Entity blocks the generator with the most progress for {0} seconds. You see its white aura during this time.

"Nobody escapes us." —Pinhead

K25P02.Name: Hex: Plaything
K25P02.Description:
A hex that toys with a victim's suffering.

The first time you hook a Survivor, they become Cursed and Hex: Plaything activates on a Dull Totem. The Cursed Survivor suffers from the Oblivious status effect until Hex: Plaything is cleansed.

Hex: Plaything's totem aura is revealed to the Cursed Survivor when within {0} meters of it. For the first {1} seconds, only the Cursed Survivor can cleanse the totem.

"We came. Now you must come with us. Taste our pleasures." —Pinhead

K25P03.Name: Scourge Hook: Gift of Pain
K25P03.Description:
You are the bringer of sweet pain.

At the start of the trial, up to {0} random hooks are changed into scourge hooks. You see their auras in white.

When a Survivor is unhooked from a scourge hook, they suffer from the Hemorrhage and Mangled status effect until fully healed. The first time the Survivor is healed, they suffer a {1}% penalty to healing and repairing actions until injured again.

"We'll tear your soul apart." —Pinhead

Coulrophobia.Name: Coulrophobia
Coulrophobia.Description: Your presence alone instills great fear. Survivors within your Terror Radius have a {0}% penalty to healing progress speed.

pop_goes_the_weasel.Name: Pop Goes the Weasel
pop_goes_the_weasel.Description:
A deep bond with The Entity unlocks great strength. After hooking a Survivor, the next generator you damage instantly loses {0}% of its progress. Normal generator regression applies after the Damage Generator action.
Pop Goes the Weasel is active for {1} seconds after the Survivor is hooked.

Bamboozle.Name: Bamboozle
Bamboozle.Description:
Your vault speed is {0}% faster.
Performing a vault action calls upon The Entity to block that vault location for {1} seconds.
Only 1 vault location may be blocked in this way at any time. The vault location is blocked only for Survivors.
Does not affect pallets.

WindowsOfOpportunity.Name: Windows of Opportunity
WindowsOfOpportunity.Description:
Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability. Auras of pallets, breakable walls, and vault locations are revealed to you when within a {0} meter range.
“Rise and shine, work hard, carve out your name,
Take aim, pull the trigger, hit the bulls eye for fame,
Know the value of faith, an’ family, and don’t you complain,
Open wide, your windows of opportunity.”
-Kate Denson's "Windows of Opportunity"

BoilOver.Name: Boil Over
BoilOver.Description:
You are a battler and do everything to escape a foe's grasp. Your struggling effects on The Killer are increased by {0}%.
You obscure The Killer's ability to see hook auras within {1} meters.
You gain {2} % wiggling progress when the Killer drops from great heights.
“Buck and Wild,
Swing to be free,
Your hands just can’t keep ahold of me.”
-Kate Denson’s “Boil Over”

Dance_with_me.Name: Dance With Me
Dance_with_me.Description:
When performing a fast vault or leaving a locker in a sprint, you leave no scratch marks for {0} seconds.
Dance With Me has a cooldown of {1} seconds.
“Another show’s off and runnin’,
Dance with me, cuz there’s a storm a comin’,
Follow my boots, try to keep up,
Dance with me, until sun up.”
-Kate Denson's "Dance With Me"

Diversion.Name: Diversion
Diversion.Description:
Activatable perk.
Being within the Killer Terror Radius while not in a chase for {0} seconds activates Diversion.
  • Once Diversion is activated, press the Active Ability button while crouched and motionless to throw a pebble, which creates a distraction for The Killer at a distance of 20 meters.

  • The perk timer resets once the ability has been activated.

    • The distraction consists of:
  • A loud noise notification
  • Scratch marks

    • “There’s what is easy and then there’s what is right. If you confuse the two, there’s no telling what you become.” -Adam Francis

Deliverance.Name: Deliverance
Deliverance.Description:
After performing a safe hook rescue on another Survivor, Deliverance activates.
You now have a 100% chance of unhooking yourself during the escape attempt.
A successful Deliverance from the hook triggers the Broken status effect for {0} seconds.
“I was raised by a strict man who taught me how to make the best of a bad situation.” -Adam Francis

Autodidact.Name: Autodidact
Autodidact.Description:
You start the trial with a -{1}% progress penalty for Skill Checks to heal Survivors.
For every successful Skill Check while healing a Survivor, you receive a token up to a maximum of {0} tokens.
Each token grants you a +{2}% progress bonus.
Great Skill Checks cannot be performed while using Autodidact.
  • Autodidact is not active when using a Med Kit to heal.

    • “There’s no limit to what you can achieve, as long as you back it up with hard work.” -Adam Francis

SpiritFury.Name: Spirit Fury
SpiritFury.Description:
Each pallet you break magnifies the wrath of The Entity.
After breaking {0} pallets, the next time you are stunned by a pallet, The Entity will instantly break the pallet.
You still suffer from the stun effect penalty.
“Fury is her blood.”

Hex_HauntedGround.Name: Hex: Haunted Ground
Hex_HauntedGround.Description:
Two trapped Hex Totems will spawn in the trial.
When either one of the two trapped Hex Totems is cleansed by a Survivor, all Survivors suffer from the Exposed status effect for {0} seconds.
The remaining trapped Hex Totem immediately becomes a Dull Totem.

“Her home became profane.”

Rancor.Name: Rancor
Rancor.Description:
You become obsessed with one Survivor.
Each time a generator is completed, your Obsession sees your aura for {0} seconds.
Each time a generator is completed, all Survivors' locations are revealed to you for {1} seconds.
Once all generators are completed, the Obsession has the Exposed status effect and you can kill your Obsession.
  • The Killer can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.

S28P01.Name: Clairvoyance
S28P01.Description:
There is an intrinsic energy in you that sees beyond your vision.

Clairvoyance activates whenever you cleanse a Totem.

When empty-handed, hold the Ability button to unlock your full aura-reading potential. For up to {0} seconds, you see the auras of exit gate switches, generators, hooks, chest and the hatch within a {1} meter range.

"Does anyone else see that? Just me?" —Mikaela Reid

S28P02.Name: Boon: Circle of Healing
S28P02.Description:
A boon that offers comfort amidst the terror.

Press and hold the Ability button near a Dull or Hex Totem to bless it and create a Boon Totem. Soft chimes ring out in a {0} meter range.

Any Survivors within the Boon Totem's range gain a {1}% healing speed bonus and can heal themselves without needing a Med-Kit.

You can only bless one Totem at a time. All equipped boon perks are active on your Boon Totem.

"Try this, it’s better than anything you’ll find in a pharmacy." —Mikaela Reid

S28P03.Name: Boon: Shadow Step
S28P03.Description:
A boon that conceals the truth.

Press and hold the Ability button near a Dull or Hex Totem to bless it and create a Boon Totem. Soft chimes ring out in a {0} meter range.

Any Survivors within the Boon Totem’s range will have their scratch marks and auras hidden to the Killer. This effect lingers for {1} seconds after leaving the Boon Totem’s range.

You can only bless one Totem at a time. All equipped boon perks are active on your Boon Totem.

"Stick to the shadows and cover your tracks." —Mikaela Reid

K26P01.Name: Grim Embrace
K26P01.Description:
Your act of servitude to The Entity has not gone unnoticed.

Each time a Survivor is hooked for the first time, you gain a token. Upon reaching {0} tokens Grim Embrace activates.

The Entity blocks all generators for {1} seconds. The Obsession's aura is revealed to you for {2} seconds.

"Are we nothing but prisoners to our sorrow?"—Carmina Mora

K26P02.Name: Scourge Hook: Pain Resonance
K26P02.Description:
Overwhelming pain reverberates outwards into chaos.

At the start of the trial, up to {0} random hooks are changed into scourge hooks. You see their auras in white.

Any time a Survivor is hooked on a scourge hook, the generator with the most progress explodes, instantly losing {1}% progress and will start to regress. Survivors repairing the generator will scream, revealing their location.

"The pain spills beyond flesh/darkness staining the horizon." —Girl in the Shadow by Carmina Mora

K26P03.Name: Hex: Pentimento
K26P03.Description:
You reveal the true power of the Totems, hidden within their remains.

You see the aura of destroyed Totems. You can perform a ritual on a destroyed Totem to rekindle it as a Hex Totem for Hex: Pentimento. For each Hex Totem active at the same time, Hex: Pentimento gains an additional effect.

  • 1 Hex Totem: Decreases Survivors' repair speed by {0}%.
  • 2 Hex Totems: Decreases Survivors' healing speed by {1}%.
  • 3 Hex Totems: Decreases Survivors' recovery speed from being downed by {2}%.
  • 4 Hex Totems: Decreases Survivors' exit gate opening speed by {3}%.
  • 5 Hex Totems: All Totems are blocked by the Entity.

    • When a previously rekindled Hex Totem is removed by any means, its remains are consumed by The Entity and it cannot be rekindled again.

    "Though a pentimento is an inherently concealed piece of art, there is something to be said of the desire to discover that which is beyond." —A Guide to Art & Process (1961)

S29P01.Name: Overcome
S29P01.Description:
You've calculated how much energy you can risk to expend.

When you are injured, you retain the movement speed bonus for {0} seconds longer.

Overcome causes the Exhausted status effect for {1} seconds.

Overcome cannot be used when Exhausted.

"After careful analysis, we're getting the hell out of here!" —Jonah Vasquez

S29P02.Name: Corrective Action
S29P02.Description:
You quickly analyze problems and correct other's work when they make a mistake.

You start the trial with {0} token(s) and gain a token, up to a maximum of {1}, for every great Skill Check.

When a Survivor fails a Skill Check while cooperating with you, 1 token is consumed and their failed Skill Check becomes a good Skill Check.

"Can't hurt to have another set of eyes on the problem." —Jonah Vasquez

S29P03.Name: Boon: Exponential
S29P03.Description:
When it seems like your number is up, you consider ways to recalculate the odds.

Press and hold the Ability button near a Dull or Hex Totem to bless it and create a Boon Totem. Soft chimes ring out in a {0} meter range.

All Survivors within the Boon Totem's range recover {1}% faster and can completely recover from the dying state.

You can only bless one Totem at a time. All equipped boon perks are active on your Boon Totem.

"It's not our time to die... probably." —Jonah Vasquez

Discordance.Name: Discordance
Discordance.Description:
Any generator within a range of {0} meters that is being repaired by two or more Survivors is marked by a yellow aura. When the generator is first highlighted, Discordance triggers a loud noise notification on the generator. After the generator is no longer within range or is no longer being repaired by two or more Survivors, the aura remains for another 4 seconds.

"Smartasses get killed. We always see to that." -The Legion

MadGrit.Name: Mad Grit
MadGrit.Description:
While carrying a Survivor, you suffer no cooldown for missed basic attacks and successfully hitting another Survivor with a basic attack will pause the carried Survivor’s wiggle timer for {0} seconds.

“There’s no getting out of this now. We’re too good at it.” -The Legion

IronMaiden.Name: Iron Maiden
IronMaiden.Description:
You open lockers {0}% faster.

Survivors who exit lockers suffer from the Exposed status effect for {2} seconds and scream, revealing their location for {1} seconds.

“This is no place for cowards.” -The Legion

Breakdown.Name: Breakdown
Breakdown.Description:
Any time you are removed from a hook (escaped or saved), the hook breaks and the Killer's aura is shown to you for {0} seconds. A hook broken by this perk takes 180 seconds to respawn.

“Charge from the Belly of the Beast.”
Here's a sketch/painting on a piece of wood I saw by the side of the road. I felt like it got a story to tell. And it didn’t waste its second chance. –Jeff, ink and oil wash on slice of wood, 12x16

Aftercare.Name: Aftercare
Aftercare.Description:
Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability.

You see the aura of every Survivor that:
  • You rescue from a hook, or rescues you from a hook;
  • You complete a healing action on, or completes a healing action on you.

    • They also see your aura.

    This occurs for up to {0} Survivors. All effects of Aftercare are reset when you are hooked by The Killer.

    “A Mercy that Rips the Storm.”
    Oil work to honor my best buddies who happen to be the best musicians I know. Their first album is still my favorite. It got me through a dark time in my life. –Jeff, oil on canvas, 16x16

Distortion.Name: Distortion
Distortion.Description:
You start the trial with {0} tokens.

When your aura would be shown to The Killer, Distortion activates and a token is consumed.

For the next {1} seconds while Distortion is activated, you do not leave scratch marks and your aura will not be shown to The Killer.
  • Distortion does not activate when you are in dying state or in a trap.


    • “Death Fooled by the Cloak of Falcon Feathers.”
    Sketch inspired by a few sleepless nights during winter. Exploration of Norse mythology: bravery can conceal your flaws, even when you are at your most vulnerable. –Jeff, pencil on toned paper, 12x12

K27P01.Name: Scourge Hook: Floods of Rage
K27P01.Description:
You form a psychic connection with The Entity and alter the rules of the trial.

At the start of the trial, up to {0} random hooks are changed into scourge hooks. You see their auras in white.

When a Survivor is unhooked from a scourge hook, all other Survivors have their auras revealed for {1} seconds.

K27P02.Name: Call of Brine
K27P02.Description:
Your psychic abilities influence technology in devastating ways.

After damaging a generator this perk becomes active for {0} seconds.

The generator regresses at {1}% of the normal regression speed and its aura is revealed to you.

Each time a Survivor completes a good Skill Check on a generator affected by this perk, you receive a loud noise notification.

K27P03.Name: Merciless Storm
K27P03.Description:
Your horrible trauma is felt by everyone.

When a generator reaches {0}% progress, Survivors working on the generator will be faced with continuous Skill Checks. If they miss or stop repairing, the generator is blocked for {1} seconds.

Merciless Storm can only trigger once per generator per trial.

S30P01.Name: Parental Guidance
S30P01.Description:
You have inherited the ability to hear the dead – and now, the dead warn you of danger.

After stunning the Killer by any means, your scratch marks, pools of blood and grunts of pain are hidden for {0} seconds.

S30P02.Name: Empathic Connection
S30P02.Description:
Your presence psychically projects itself to those in danger.

Whenever another Survivor is injured, they can see your aura within a range of {0} meters.

You heal other Survivors {1}% faster.

S30P03.Name: Boon: Dark Theory
S30P03.Description:
Your obsessive study of the paranormal has given you unprecedented knowledge of other realms and planes of existence.

Press and hold the Ability button near a Dull or Hex Totem to bless it and create a Boon Totem. Soft chimes ring out in a {0} meter range.

Any Survivors within the Boon Totem’s range gain a {1}% Haste status effect. This effect lingers for {2} seconds after leaving the Boon Totem's range.

You can only bless one Totem at a time. All equipped boon perks are active on your Boon Totem.

BorrowedTime.Name: Borrowed Time
BorrowedTime.Description:
You are fueled by unexpected energy when saving an ally from a hook.
Survivors you unhook gain the Endurance status effect for {0} seconds.

"Probably stings like hell, but it ain't gonna kill ya. Up and at 'em soldier. Time to move!" — Bill Overbeck

SelfSufficient.Name: Unbreakable
SelfSufficient.Description:
Past battles have taught you a thing or two about survival.
Grants the ability to fully recover from the dying state once per trial. Increases dying recovery speed by {0}%.
"Goddammit, I am seriously FUBAR!" -Bill

LeftBehind.Name: Left Behind
LeftBehind.Description:
Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability.
If you are the last Survivor remaining in the trial, you can see the aura of the Hatch within a {0} meter range.
"I'm not horseshittin' around. I'm doing this alone!" -Bill

CorruptIntervention.Name: Corrupt Intervention
CorruptIntervention.Description:
Your prayers invoke a dark power that meddles with the Survivors’s chances of survival. {0} generators located furthest from you are blocked by The Entity for {1} seconds at the start of the trial.
Survivors cannot repair these generators for the duration. Affected generators are highlighted by a white aura.

“It shall be known across the land that the Gods curse the unfaithful.” (The Tablet of Adiris, 3.7.)

InfectiousFright.Name: Infectious Fright
InfectiousFright.Description:
The cries of the unfaithful makes your heart leap.
Any Survivors that are within your Terror Radius while another Survivor is put into the dying state will yell and reveal their location to you for {0} seconds.
“Horror overcomes the heart of infidels who cry at the feet of the fallen.” (Hymn of Praise, 11. 4)

DarkDevotion.Name: Dark Devotion
DarkDevotion.Description:
The display of your powers creates a whirlwind of panic that spreads throughout the land.

You become obsessed with one Survivor. Hitting the Obsession with a basic attack transfers your Terror Radius to the Obsession for {1} seconds, and sets its radius to {0} meters. You are granted the Undetectable status effect for the duration.

The Survivor with the transferred Terror Radius is also considered to be "inside the Terror Radius" for other purposes.

  • The Killer can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.


    • “And terror shall take hold of a defiant non-believer, who shall falsely announce my arrival.” (The Tablet of Adiris, 48.9)

Solidarity.Name: Solidarity
Solidarity.Description:
Sharing painful experiences has the power to heal.
While injured, healing a Survivor without using a Med-kit also heals you at a {0}% conversion rate.
“Showing up when things get rough, listening to people’s problems, and supporting those in need; that’s how you become stronger, that’s how you grow.” –Jane Romero

Poised.Name: Poised
Poised.Description:
Achieving goals boosts your confidence.
After a generator is completed, you leave no scratch marks for {0} seconds.
“Ok, stay calm. Don’t overthink it and just keep moving forward: you got this. –Jane Romero

HeadOn.Name: Head On
HeadOn.Description:
When your mind is set, there better be no one standing in your way.

While standing in a locker, for {0} seconds, Head On activates.
While Head On is activated, perform a rush action to leave a locker to use Head On. If The Killer is standing within Head On's effective range, The Killer is stunned for {1} seconds.
Causes the Exhausted status effect for {2} seconds.
Head On cannot be used while Exhausted.
You do not recover from the Exhausted status effect while running.
Head On cannot be used when you have idle crows.

“People are remembered for the challenges they overcome. You can run away and forget what you’re capable of or you can face your fears and remind the world who you are.” –Jane Romero

ImAllEars.Name: I'm All Ears
ImAllEars.Description:
Your keen senses are sharpened in the dark realm of The Entity.

Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability. Any Survivor performing a rushed action within 48 meters from your location will have their aura revealed for {0} seconds.

I'm All Ears can only be triggered once every {1} seconds.

“There is no need to worry. I’ve been preparing my whole life for this." –The Ghost Face

ThrillingTremors.Name: Thrilling Tremors
ThrillingTremors.Description:
Your dark designs and shrewd composure rouse The Entity.

After picking up a Survivor, all Generators not being repaired by Survivors are blocked by The Entity and cannot be repaired for the next {0} seconds. Affected generators are highlighted by a white aura.

Thrilling Tremors can only be triggered once every {1} seconds.

"The night assists me and it’s endless here." –The Ghost Face

FurtiveChase.Name: Furtive Chase
FurtiveChase.Description:
You become obsessed with one Survivor. You lurk in the shadows, eliminating your victims one by one. When your Obsession is hooked, Furtive Chase receives a token, up to a maximum of {0} tokens.

Each token decreases your Terror Radius by {1} meters while in a chase.

When a Survivor rescues the Obsession from a hook, the rescuer becomes the Obsession.

  • The Killer can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.


    • "You have no idea what I have planned for you. It’ll be in the news for weeks: I’ll make sure of it." –The Ghost Face

Surge.Name: Jolt
Surge.Description:
Your eerie presence charges the air and interferes with technology.

Putting a Survivor into the dying state with a basic attack causes all generators within a {0} meter radius instantly to explode and begin regressing. Generators affected by Jolt immediately lose {1}% of their progress.
  • Jolt can only be triggered once every {2} seconds.


    • “The creature appears to have some unknown influence over electricity and nearby electronics.” -Hawkins National Laboratory

Mindbreaker.Name: Fearmonger
Mindbreaker.Description:
Your distressing presence drains and weakens your prey.

While repairing generators, Survivors are afflicted by the Blindness and Exhausted status effect.

Any existing Exhausted status effect timers are paused while the Survivor is repairing a generator. After ending the repair action, the Survivor is afflicted by the Blindness and Exhausted status effect for {1} seconds.

"The specimen's apparent telepathic ability can evoke feelings of dread and fatigue in nearby individuals." -Hawkins National Laboratory

CruelConfinement.Name: Claustrophobia
CruelConfinement.Description:
Your ties to the otherworldly manifest when your prey attempts to get away.

Every time a generator is completed, all windows and vault locations within a {0} meter radius of the completed generator are blocked for all Survivors for the next {1} seconds.

You see the aura of the vault locations blocked by Claustrophobia for the duration.

“The specimen seems to be able to affect the state of nearby objects, as if they existed in some other form within a dimension alternate to our own.” -Hawkins National Laboratory

BetterTogether.Name: Situational Awareness
BetterTogether.Description:
You seek justice and uncover the truth no matter what obstacle stands in your way.

The aura of the generator you are currently repairing is revealed to all other Survivors located within {0} meters.

If The Killer downs a Survivor while you are repairing a generator, you see the aura of all other Survivors for {1} seconds.

“Let’s burn that lab to the ground.” -Nancy Wheeler

Fixated.Name: Self-Aware
Fixated.Description:
When you have a goal in mind, there’s no turning back: better to ask forgiveness than permission.

You can see your own scratch marks at all times.

You walk {0}% faster.

"I wanna finish what we started. I want to kill it." -Nancy Wheeler

InnerStrength.Name: Inner Healing
InnerStrength.Description:
You look inward and trust your instincts when you feel lost and alone.

Each time you complete a Totem cleanse action, Inner Healing activates. If you are already afflicted by the Broken status effect, Inner Healing does not activate.

While Inner Healing is active, hiding inside a locker for {0} seconds while injured automatically heals you from injured to healthy.

Inner Healing becomes deactivated as soon as it has successfully triggered.

“All this time I’ve been trying so hard to pretend like everything’s fine, but it’s not.” -Nancy Wheeler

Babysitter.Name: Guardian
Babysitter.Description:
While you have a reputation for being self-centered, you risk it all to help those in need.

When you unhook a Survivor, they won’t leave scratch marks or pools of blood, and they gain a {0}% Haste status effect for {1} seconds.

You see the Killer's aura for {2} seconds.

“I promised to keep you shitheads safe, and that’s exactly what I plan on doing.” -Steve Harrington

Camaraderie.Name: Kinship
Camaraderie.Description:
Life has taught you the importance of friendship which has given you strength.

While you are on the hook in the struggle phase, Kinship activates.

If another Survivor is within {0} meters of you while Kinship is activated, the hook timer is paused for {1} seconds.

"So, remember once you get in there… pretend like you don’t care. There you go, you’re learning my friend. You’re learning.” -Steve Harrington

SecondWind.Name: Renewal
SecondWind.Description:
When you have healed other Survivors for the equivalent of one health state, Renewal activates. If you are already afflicted by the Broken status effect, Renewal does not activate.

While Renewal is activated, the next time you are unhooked or you unhook yourself, you are affected by the Broken status effect. After a total duration of {0} seconds, Renewal automatically heals you from injured to healthy.

Renewal deactivates once you become healthy or if you are put into the dying state before Renewal successfully triggers. You lose the Broken status effect.

"Yeah, that’s a no." -Steve Harrington

ZanshinTactics.Name: Zanshin Tactics
ZanshinTactics.Description:
Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability. You are mentally alert and aware of key points on the battlefield.

The auras of all pallets, breakable walls, and vault locations are revealed to you within a {0} meter range.

“Within your enemy’s strength is weakness.” -Renjiro’s Doctrine 12:5

BloodEcho.Name: Blood Echo
BloodEcho.Description:
The agony of one is inflicted on others.

When hooking a Survivor, all other injured Survivors suffer from the Hemorrhage and Exhaustion status effect for {0} seconds.

Blood Echo has a cooldown of {1} seconds.

“Attack an enemy with precision and their allies will feel it.” -Renjiro’s Doctrine 6:3

Nemesis.Name: Nemesis
Nemesis.Description:
You seek retribution on those who have wronged you. A Survivor who blinds you or stuns you using a pallet or locker becomes your Obsession.

Anytime a new Survivor becomes the Obsession, they are affected by the Oblivious status effect for {0} seconds and their aura is shown to you for {1} seconds.

  • The Killer can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.


    • “Only a fool would spit in a demon’s face and declare victory.” -Renjiro’s Doctrine 4:9

LuckyBreak.Name: Lucky Break
LuckyBreak.Description:
You’ve had your share of scrapes and bruises, but luck’s always on your side.

Lucky Break activates any time you are injured. While Lucky Break is active, you won’t leave trails of blood or scratch marks for a total of {0} seconds.

Lucky Break is permanently deactivated for the remainder of the Trial once the total duration has elapsed.

“That’s not enough to beat me. Not even close.” -Yui Kimura

AnyMeansNecessary.Name: Any Means Necessary
AnyMeansNecessary.Description:
You stand up for yourself, using whatever’s on hand to gain an advantage.

You see the auras of dropped Pallets.
  • Press and hold the Active Ability button for {0} seconds while standing beside a dropped pallet to reset it to its upright position.

    • Any Means Necessary has a cooldown of {1} seconds.

    “I’ll hit you with everything I’ve got. Then I’ll do it again.” -Yui Kimura

Breakout.Name: Breakout
Breakout.Description:
You kick into high gear when someone’s in trouble, inspiring them to overcome any obstacle.

When within {0} meters of a carried Survivor, you gain the Haste status effect, moving at {1}% increased speed. The carried Survivor’s wiggle speed is increased by {2}%.

“Come, we’re going to rip our way out of this.” -Yui Kimura

Balanced_Landing.Name: Balanced Landing
Balanced_Landing.Description:
Your agility is incomparable.

After falling from a height, cat-like reflexes reduce your stagger duration from falling by {0}% and reduce the volume of grunts from falling by 100%. You start sprinting at {1}% your normal running speed for a maximum of {2} seconds.

Causes the Exhausted status effect for {3} seconds.

Balanced Landing cannot be used while Exhausted.

You do not recover from the Exhausted status effect while running.

"I've jumped from higher places." -Nea

Urban_Evasion.Name: Urban Evasion
Urban_Evasion.Description:
Years of evading the cops taught you a thing or two about stealth. Your movement speed while crouching is increased by {0}%.
"The paint is still fresh but I'm long gone." -Nea

Streetwise.Name: Streetwise
Streetwise.Description:
Long nights out taught you to do a lot with what you've got. Reduce consumption rate of item charge by {0}% for you and allies within a {1} meter range. Once out of range, this effect persists for {2} seconds.
"You're doing it wrong! Let me show you how it's done." -Nea

Thanatophobia.Name: Thanatophobia
Thanatophobia.Description:
Their courage fades in the face of undeniable mortality.
For each injured, dying, or hooked Survivor, all Survivors receive a penalty of {0}% to a maximum of {1}% to repair, sabotage and Totem-cleansing speeds.
"She plays with us and revels in our pain."

NurseCalling.Name: A Nurse's Calling
NurseCalling.Description:
Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability. The auras of Survivors who are healing or being healed are revealed to you when they are within a {0} meter range.
“Still attached to the fragments of her past life, she is drawn to those in need of help.”

Stridor.Name: Stridor
Stridor.Description:
You are acutely sensitive to the breathing of your prey. Breathing of Survivors in pain is {0}% louder and regular breathing is {1}% louder.
“If you don’t stop and catch your breath… she will.”

OffTheRecord.Name: Off the Record
OffTheRecord.Description:
You’ve learned that a quiet approach is sometimes best.

Once you are unhooked or escape from the hook, Off the Record activates for {0} seconds.

While Off the Record is active, your aura will not be shown to The Killer and grunts of pain caused by injuries are reduced by {1}%.

"Trust me, I investigate thoroughly and discreetly." -Zarina Kassir

RedHerring.Name: Red Herring
RedHerring.Description:
You’ve noticed that people pay attention to whatever makes the loudest noise.

After repairing a generator for at least {0} seconds, it will be highlighted to you with a yellow aura. The generator stays highlighted until it is fully repaired, or you repair a new generator, or enter a locker.

Entering any locker will trigger a loud noise indicator for The Killer at the highlighted generator's location.
  • Red Herring can only be triggered once every {1} seconds.


    • "The news edit out what is burdensome and complex, which is the truth." -Zarina Kassir

ForThePeople.Name: For the People
ForThePeople.Description:
You risk life and injury for others.

For the People is only active while at full health.

Press the Active Ability button while healing another Survivor without a Med-Kit to instantly heal them from dying to injured, or from injured to healthy.

You become injured and receive the Broken status effect for {0} seconds.

You become the Obsession.

Equipping this perk decreases your chances to be The Killer’s Obsession at the start of the trial.

"We can write our own story and decide how it really ends." -Zarina Kassir

Gearhead.Name: Gearhead
Gearhead.Description:
You’ve got an ear for well-oiled gears.

After a Survivor loses a health state, Gearhead activates.

While Gearhead is active, each time a Survivor completes a Great Skill Check while repairing, their aura is revealed to you for {0} seconds.

"Sometimes a man's best work is what puts him in the grave." -The prison warden

DeadMansSwitch.Name: Dead Man’s Switch
DeadMansSwitch.Description:
When you hook a Survivor, Dead Man’s Switch activates for the next {0} seconds.

While activated, any Survivor that stops repairing a generator before it is fully repaired causes The Entity to block the generator until Dead Man’s Switch's effect ends.

Affected generators are highlighted by a white aura.

"I've seen the look on a man's face when he realizes he's going to die." -Caleb Quinn

HexRetribution.Name: Hex: Retribution
HexRetribution.Description:
A Hex that lashes out upon its destruction. Those who cross you will be punished.

Any Survivor interacting with a Dull Totem or a Hex Totem will suffer from the Oblivious status effect for {0} seconds.

If any Hex Totem is removed, including this one, the auras of all Survivors are revealed for {1} seconds.

"Bloody fool, you pulled the trigger on yourself." -Caleb Quinn

SoulGuard.Name: Soul Guard
SoulGuard.Description:
You have been through immense hardship and you’re stronger for it.

Gain the Endurance status effect for {0} seconds after being healed or having recovered from the dying state.
While cursed by a Hex, you can fully recover from the dying state.

This effect can only trigger once every 30 seconds.

BloodPact.Name: Blood Pact
BloodPact.Description:
It’s as if a latent part of yourself has awakened. You feel like you can reach out beyond yourself for assistance.

When you or the Obsession are injured, you both see each other's auras.

After completing a healing action on the Obsession, or having the Obsession complete a healing action on you, you both gain a {1}% Haste status effect until no longer within 16m of each other.

Reduces the odds of being the Obsession.

If you are the Obsession, this perk deactivates.

RepressedAlliance.Name: Repressed Alliance
RepressedAlliance.Description:
You’re accustomed to being hunted by malicious forces, and you’ve begun using it to your advantage.

Repressed Alliance activates after repairing generators for a total of {0} seconds.

When repairing a generator while the perk is active, press the Active Ability button to call upon The Entity to block the generator for {1} seconds. The perk deactivates.

Affected generators will be revealed by a white aura to all Survivors.

ForcedPenance.Name: Forced Penance
ForcedPenance.Description:
Those who stand in the way of duty will suffer harsh judgment.

Survivors who take a protection hit are inflicted with the Broken status effect for {0} seconds.

TrailofTorment.Name: Trail of Torment
TrailofTorment.Description:
You guide your victims along a path of pain and punishment.

After kicking a generator, you become Undetectable until the generator stops regressing or a Survivor is injured or put into the dying state by any means. During this time, the generator’s yellow aura is revealed to Survivors.

This effect can only trigger once every {2} seconds.

Deathbound.Name: Deathbound
Deathbound.Description:
Those whose lives are intertwined in darkness are destined to suffer together.

When a Survivor heals another Survivor for one health state at least {0} meters away from the Killer, the Survivor performing the healing action will scream, revealing their location and activating Deathbound for the next {1} seconds. During that time, the Survivor will suffer from the Oblivious status effect when further than {2} meters away from the healed Survivor.

DragonsGrip.Name: Dragon’s Grip
DragonsGrip.Description:
After kicking a generator, for the next {0} seconds, the first Survivor that interacts with it will scream, revealing their location for {1} seconds, and becoming afflicted with the Exposed status effect for {2} seconds.

Dragon’s Grip has a cooldown of {3} seconds.

“Such potential in this compound... even the slightest trace causes unnatural effects.” —Journal of Talbot Grimes

HexUndying.Name: Hex: Undying
HexUndying.Description:
While Hex: Undying is active, Survivors within {0} meters of any Dull Totem have their aura revealed.

When another Hex Totem is cleansed, that Totem's Hex transfers to the Hex: Undying Totem, deactivating Hex: Undying. Any tokens the transferred Hex had are transferred as well.

HexBloodFavor.Name: Hex: Blood Favor
HexBloodFavor.Description:
A Hex that gains The Entity’s favor when blood is spilled.

Injuring a Survivor will call upon The Entity to block pallets from being pulled down within a {0} meter radius of the Survivor location for {1} seconds.

The Hex effect persist as long as the related Hex Totem is standing.

“It would be no leap of the imagination to suggest that the trials are a biological response of sorts.” —Journal of Talbot Grimes

Visionary.Name: Visionary
Visionary.Description:
You’re remarkably focused on your means of escape.

You see generator’s auras within {0} meters.

Anytime a generator is completed, Visionary is disabled for {1} seconds.

DesperateMeasures.Name: Desperate Measures
DesperateMeasures.Description:
You refuse to fail, even during your darkest hour.

For each injured, hooked, or dying Survivor, increase the speed of your healing and unhook actions by {0}%.

"When they come with a wrecking ball, build stronger walls.” —Felix Richter

BuiltToLast.Name: Built to Last
BuiltToLast.Description:
You know how to get the most out of your tools.

After hiding inside a locker for {0} seconds with a depleted item in hand, {1}% of its charges are refilled.
Each use of Built to Last reduces the amounts of charges refilled by {2}%

"Architecture is the soul of civilization.” —Felix Richter
